name: 領導與人才發展實務研究
goals: Unlock the potential of leadership and talent development knowledge
Enrich the capability to facilitate leadership and talent development effectiveness
Increase confidence and passion for developing leadership and talent.
syllabus:
**【授課方式：****16+2****週】，彈性2週，將採自主學習及專題報告的方式進行**

Week 1: Action Learning 行動學習

Week 2: Presentation 表達影響力

Week 3: Human ResourcesDevelopment Practices人力資源發展實務

Week 4: Enterprise TrainingPractices企業教育訓練實務

Week 5: Talent Potential潛力研究

Week 6: Development Journey發展旅程

Week 7: Development by Experience歷練發展

Week 8: Mentoring and Coaching導師/教練

Week 9: Situational Leadership情境領導力

Week 10: Leading Team 團隊領導力

Week 11: Visionary Leadership願景領導力

Week 12: Leading Change 變革領導力

Week 13: Leadership Agility敏捷領導力

Week 14: Leadership Judgement決斷領導力

Week 15: Risk Management 風險管理力

Week 16: Engagement敬業度

methodologies.note: Will talk about leadership and talent development related know-hows and practices.
Will apply various format of group discussions in the course.
Will use action learning approach to experience leadership competencies development.

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
